effect_entries.effect: Teaches Sleep Talk to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Dragon Tail to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Sleep Talk)

flavor_text_entries.text:
相手を　はじきとばして
控えの　ポケモンを　ひきずりだす。
野生の　場合は　戦闘が　終わる。

The target is knocked away, and a different
Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this
ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

Chi la usa fa volar via il bersaglio in modo che
venga sostituito. Se il bersaglio è un singolo
Pokémon selvatico, la lotta finisce.

Una saca donde guardar los objetos útiles para
la exploración. Permite acceder al Subsuelo.

Fegt das Ziel vom Feld und wechselt es
mit einem anderen Pokémon aus.
Beendet Kämpfe gegen wilde Pokémon.

Un coup puissant qui blesse la cible et l’envoie
au loin. Dans la nature, met fin au combat.

상대를 튕겨내서
교대할 포켓몬을 끌어낸다.
야생의 경우에는 배틀이 끝난다.

あいてを　はじきとばして
ひかえの　ポケモンを　ひきずりだす。
やせいなら　せんとうが　おわる。

The user knocks away the target and
drags out another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.

The user knocks away the target and
drags out another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.

Un coup puissant qui blesse la cible
et l’envoie balader. Dans la nature,
met fin au combat.

While it is asleep, the user
randomly uses one of the moves
it knows.

While it is asleep, the user
randomly uses one of the moves
it knows.

While it is asleep, the user
randomly uses one of the moves
it knows.
